items.name: Health Data Generation Time In epoch

parameters: $.metadata.generation_time
return value == 0 ? 1 : 0;

trigger_prototypes.expression: last(/SoporeNet Foreman Monitoring Template/foreman.health.cv.statuscode[{#NAME}])<>0 and last(/SoporeNet Foreman Monitoring Template/foreman.health.cv.statusinfo[{#NAME}])<>0
